metadata.synopsis: Femme Harper Ranger after the fight with the Drider. To ppath: You started the fight with the drider, but switched sides. If you don't give the Harpers the moonlantern they came for, you will need to fight them for it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: From tutorialDebug book → Go to Region → Act 2 → SCL → Entry Point Mountain Pass Debug book → Act 2 Setup → Absolute path: gives Spider's lyre to unlock the Drider's path.in reCon: teleport S_SCL_DriderCaravan_HalfOrcCaster Say you are true soultalk to him again  → play lyre to draw in dridertalk to drider → choose to go to moonrise → follow drider to ambush pointIn ambush dialogue → turn on drider and side with harpersIn combat → ctrl k all harpers first except S_SCL_Drider_Harper_Ranger_001 (Harper Skywin) and then driderTalk to Harper Skywin

0.speaker: Harper Skywin
0.text: Victory is ours - alas, not without consequence.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

56.speaker: Harper Skywin
56.text: Examine the corpse. The lantern is yours to take.

6.speaker: Harper Skywin
6.text: Our objectives complete without drawing a weapon. Incredible work.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

7.speaker: Harper Skywin
7.text: Well played, you have a gift for cunning. Take the lantern - you earned it.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

26.speaker: Harper Skywin
26.text: Well played, you have a gift for cunning. Take the lantern - you earned it.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

31.speaker: Harper Skywin
31.text: Go on - take the lantern from the corpse.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

45.speaker: Harper Skywin
45.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

94.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lifts lantern into the air. Its glow illuminates his face,

10.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Musing, not really said to player.

64.speaker: Harper Skywin
64.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Musing, not really said to player.

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *The lantern flickers ever so briefly, and you hear a slight twitter - or perhaps it's simply your imagination.*
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows lantern in Harper's hand. The light flickers just a little, and you hear a little titter come from it. Harper stows the lantern.

48.speaker: Harper Skywin
48.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lifts lantern and illuminates their face.

74.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lifts lantern and illuminates their face.

88.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Musing, not really said to player.

12.speaker: Harper Skywin
12.text: Incredible. A light that chases away even the deepest shadows.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Musing, not really said to player.

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *The lantern flickers ever so briefly, and you hear a slight twitter - or perhaps it's simply your imagination.*
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows lantern in player's hand. The light flickers just a little, and you hear a little titter come from it. Player stows the lantern.

11.text: You. Don't move a godsdamned muscle.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Addressed to player. Harper raises bow and points at the player.

23.text: You. Don't move a godsdamned muscle.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Addressed to player. Harper raises bow and points at the player.

86.speaker: Harper Skywin
86.text: You. Don't move a godsdamned muscle.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Addressed to player. Harper raises bow and points at the player.

17.text: Talk. Why in the hells would a cultist turn on his kind?
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

18.speaker: Harper Skywin
18.text: Talk. Why in the hells would a cultist turn on their kind?
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *You notice a pin on the woman's chest, identical to the one you found in Grymforge. She is a Harper.*
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: *The pin the woman wears is familiar to you. She belongs to the Harpers, a covert organisation dedicated to freedom and balance.*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

63.text: *The pin the woman wears is familiar to you. She belongs to the Harpers, a covert organisation dedicated to freedom and balance.*
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

81.speaker: Narrator
81.text: *The pin the woman wears is familiar to you. She belongs to the Harpers, a covert organisation dedicated to freedom and balance.*
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the Harper's garb. We see a Harper pin on their chest.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: I'm not one of them. They took me prisoner.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

69.speaker: Harper Skywin
69.text: A prisoner? Of course - and you would not be the first.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

25.text: Breathe easy, then - you are a captive no longer.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

50.speaker: Harper Skywin
50.text: Breathe easy, then - you are a captive no longer.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

2.speaker: Harper Skywin
2.text: Give me the lantern. You must come to Last Light.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

9.speaker: Player
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

53.speaker: Harper Skywin
53.text: An inn, at first glance - but also a safe haven, free from the curse's tendrils, or so it's been promised.

20.speaker: Player
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

72.speaker: Harper Skywin
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

70.speaker: Harper Skywin
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

41.speaker: Harper Skywin
41.text: Stay close, and be wary of the shadows. I'll mark your map, should the way be lost.

14.text: What is this? A cultist after all, then - vermin for crushing.

27.speaker: Harper Skywin
27.text: What is this? A cultist after all, then - vermin for crushing.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Sorry. I don't have it anymore.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: How about I just kill you and keep the lantern for myself?

62.speaker: Harper Skywin
62.text: Another wretch among many. And another kill for my list.

73.speaker: Harper Skywin
73.text: You must rest. Come - I will take you to Last Light.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I will make my way there in my own time.

75.speaker: Harper Skywin
75.text: Then permit me to mark your map. We will await, for when you are at your most weary.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: My goddess protects me. I'll find my own way there.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I couldn't bear the atrocities committed in the Absolute's name.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

47.speaker: Harper Skywin
47.text: Of which there have been many, I assure you. I am glad you've broken free.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I'm infected with their parasite, but I'm seeking a cure.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I succumbed to their temptations. You gave me an opportunity to escape.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

15.speaker: Harper Skywin
15.text: A cultist deserter? By the gods.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

52.speaker: Harper Skywin
52.text: Then it's time you shed your bonds and joined a righteous cause.

1.speaker: Harper Skywin
1.text: A face I once trusted, now allied with the shadows' most favoured.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Addressed to player. Harper raises bow and points at the player.NodeContext: Very suspicious

35.speaker: Harper Skywin
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I meant to infiltrate the cult. You've ruined the mission.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

93.speaker: Harper Skywin
93.text: Apologies - I had no word of this mission. Take comfort in knowing there will many more yet.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

24.speaker: Harper Skywin
24.text: Apologies - I had no word of this mission. Take comfort in knowing there will many more yet.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

8.speaker: Harper Skywin
8.text: Here - Jaheira insists you take the lantern. It will guide you safely to Moonrise Towers.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper hands player the Moonlantern

76.speaker: Harper Skywin
76.text: But it will not slay the creatures that emerge from the darkness. Be vigilant 'til the last.

40.speaker: Harper Skywin
40.text: Keep the lantern - Jaheira insisted. It will guide you safely to Moonrise Towers.

3.text: A lie, clear as the Chionthar's waters. And for that, you will bleed.

90.speaker: Harper Skywin
90.text: A lie, clear as the Chionthar's waters. And for that, you will bleed.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: The cult took me prisoner. Thank the gods you came when you did.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

68.text: I've merely heeded my calling, friend.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

43.speaker: Harper Skywin
43.text: I've merely heeded my calling, friend.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper lowers bow while speaking.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I'm not here to explain myself - I just want the lantern. Hand it over, or die.
